Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 7-2010. A 49-year-old 
man with peripheral neuropathy and ascites.
Ropper AH(1), Raje NS, Lawrimore TM, Camelo-Piragua S, Sohani AR.

Author information:
(1)Department of Neurology, Brigham and Women's Hospital, Boston, USA.

Erratum in
    N Engl J Med. 2011 May 5;364(18):1782.
